  • titan_pylib.data_structures.set.bitset32

titan_pylib.data_structures.set.bitset32 のソースコード

 1from typing import List
 2from array import array
 3


[ドキュメント]
 4class Bitset32():
 5
 6  TABLE = array('I', (1 << i for i in range(32)))
 7
 8  def __init__(self, u: int):
 9    self._size = (u >> 5) + 1
10    self._data = array('I', bytes(self._size*4))
11


[ドキュメント]
12  def add(self, k: int) -> None:
13    self._data[k>>5] |= Bitset32.TABLE[k & 31]


14


[ドキュメント]
15  def discard(self, k: int) -> None:
16    self._data[k>>5] &= ~Bitset32.TABLE[k & 31]


17


[ドキュメント]
18  def flip(self, k: int) -> None:
19    self._data[k>>5] ^= Bitset32.TABLE[k & 31]


20
21  def __contains__(self, k: int) -> bool:
22    return self._data[k>>5] >> (k & 31) & 1 == 1
23
24  def __getitem__(self, k: int):
25    return self._data[k>>5] >> (k & 31) & 1
26
27  def __setitem__(self, k: int, bit: bool):
28    if bit:
29      self._data[k>>5] |= Bitset32.TABLE[k & 31]
30    else:
31      self._data[k>>5] &= ~Bitset32.TABLE[k & 31]
32


[ドキュメント]
33  def tolist(self) -> List[int]:
34    return [(i<<5)+j for i, a in enumerate(self._data) for j in range(32) if a >> j & 1 == 1]


35
36  def __ior__(self, other: 'Bitset32'):
37    s = self._data
38    o = other._data
39    for i in range(min(len(s), len(o))):
40      s[i] |= o[i]
41    return self
42
43  def __rshift__(self, k: int):
44    # x >> y: x.__rshift__(y)
45    pass
46
47  def __rrshift__(self, k: int):
48    pass
49
50  def __str__(self):
51    return str(self.tolist())
